subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Caron Butler returned to the Washington Wizards’ lineup after a 16-game injury absence to score 19 points in a 101-99 victory over the visiting Cleveland Cavaliers at the Verizon Center on Thursday night.
snippet: Caron Butler returned to the Washington Wizards’ lineup after a 16-game injury absence to score 19 points in a 101-99 victory over the visiting Cleveland Cavaliers at the Verizon Center on Thursday night.
